---

# Threat Modeling Lite

## Procedure
1) Identify assets/data classes, trust boundaries, entry points.
2) Produce STRIDE table per boundary.
3) Write abuse cases (attacker goals + steps).
4) Specify mitigations (code/config/ops) and verification (tests/checks).

## Template
- [Threat model worksheet](./templates/threat-model.md)
